p.d: : Headlong rush Among the sources of tension between Valérie and her mother is Valérie's father, who Madeleine considers to be a first-class moron. After yet another row, a furious Valérie storms out. During her short absence, Madeleine learns some surprising things about the father/daughter relationship... Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Isabelle Langlois Cast: Sophie Cadieux (Valérie), Antoine Archambault (Thomas), Sylvie Léonard (Madeleine), Simon Lacroix (Éric), Éric Paulhus (Kevin), Éric Bernier (Stéphane), Jean-MoIse Martin (Simon), Olivia Palacci (Genevieve), Christine Beaulieu (Josiane) Genre: comedy drama
